name: AttackEmpire (Prototype V2)
description:
Snail Games presents: 

The game is set in Ancient Rome. Lucius has the ambition to defeat Nero, the Emperor, who brought much chaos to Rome, for that he will have the help of Kiyara, who will accompany you on your journey.

This is the prototype

Commands:

Arrow keys move the character

Pressing the Z player Attacks

Pressing X player Advocates
